doc:
Jean-Pierre Lorit https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Pierre_Lorit 0 Jean-Pierre Lorit (born 29 November 1960) is a French actor. His most recognizable role is in the film Three Colors: Red. In 2005, he performed August Strindberg's Créanciers directed by Hélène Vincent, with Lambert Wilson and Emmanuelle Devos. And he got nominated for a 2006 Molière Awards Best supporting role. Jean-Pierre_Lorit ( born_29_November_1960 ) is a_French_actor . His_most_recognizable_role is in the_film_Three_Colors_:_Red . In 2005 , he performed August_Strindberg 's_Créanciers directed by Hélène_Vincent , with Lambert_Wilson and Emmanuelle_Devos . And he got_nominated for a_2006_Molière_Awards_Best_supporting_role .
